mapper.select: SELECT distinct s.student_id AS studentId, s.hrd_net_id AS hrdNetId, s.name, s.bank, s.account, s.manager_id AS managerId, s.is_active AS isActive, sc.student_course_seq AS studentCourseSeq, sc.course_seq AS courseSeq, c.course_number AS courseNumber, c.academy_location AS academyLocation, c.course_name AS courseName, (select settlement_date from view_students_course_scholarship_settlement where student_id = s.student_id and course_seq = sc.course_seq) as settlementDate, (select totalPoint from view_students_course_point where student_id = s.student_id and course_seq = sc.course_seq and pc.is_active = true) as totalPoint, 500000 as scholarshipAmount FROM students s LEFT JOIN students_courses sc ON s.student_id = sc.student_id LEFT JOIN courses c on c.course_seq = sc.course_seq LEFT JOIN students_points sp on sp.student_course_seq = sc.student_course_seq LEFT JOIN point_categories pc on sp.point_seq = pc.point_seq WHERE c.academy_location = #{academyLocation} AND s.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND s.is_active = true AND c.is_active = true AND (IF(#{courseNumber}, 0, '기수') = '기수' OR c.course_number = #{courseNumber}) AND (select totalPoint from view_students_course_point where student_id = s.student_id and course_seq = sc.course_seq and pc.is_active = true) >= 50 AND (select settlement_date from view_students_course_scholarship_settlement where student_id = s.student_id and course_seq = sc.course_seq) is null ORDER BY c.course_number desc, name limit #{limit} offset #{offset}

SELECT count(distinct s.student_id) as countBenefitTarget FROM students s LEFT JOIN students_courses sc ON s.student_id = sc.student_id LEFT JOIN courses c on c.course_seq = sc.course_seq LEFT JOIN students_points sp on sp.student_course_seq = sc.student_course_seq LEFT JOIN point_categories pc on sp.point_seq = pc.point_seq WHERE c.academy_location = #{academyLocation} AND s.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND s.is_active = true AND c.is_active = true AND (IF(#{courseNumber}, 0, '기수') = '기수' OR c.course_number = #{courseNumber}) AND (select totalPoint from view_students_course_point where student_id = s.student_id and course_seq = sc.course_seq and pc.is_active = true) >= 50 AND (select settlement_date from view_students_course_scholarship_settlement where student_id = s.student_id and course_seq = sc.course_seq) is null

SELECT s.student_id AS studentId, s.hrd_net_id AS hrdNetId, s.name, s.bank, s.account, s.manager_id AS managerId, s.is_active AS isActive, sc.student_course_seq AS studentCourseSeq, sc.course_seq AS courseSeq, c.course_number AS courseNumber, c.course_name AS courseName, ssd.settlement_date AS settlementDate, ssd.amount as scholarshipAmount FROM students s LEFT JOIN students_courses sc ON s.student_id = sc.student_id LEFT JOIN courses c ON c.course_seq = sc.course_seq LEFT JOIN scholarships ssd ON ssd.student_course_seq = sc.student_course_seq WHERE (IF(#{courseNumber}, 0, '기수') = '기수' OR c.course_number = #{courseNumber}) AND s.is_active = true AND c.academy_location = #{academyLocation} AND s.name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND s.is_active = true AND c.is_active = true AND (#{settlementDate} IS NULL OR #{settlementDate} = '' OR settlement_date = #{settlementDate}) AND settlement_date != '' AND ssd.is_active = true ORDER BY ssd.settlement_date desc, c.course_number desc, s.name limit #{limit} offset #{offset};

SELECT count(s.student_id) as countResult FROM students s LEFT JOIN students_courses sc ON s.student_id = sc.student_id LEFT JOIN courses c ON c.course_seq = sc.course_seq LEFT JOIN scholarships ssd ON ssd.student_course_seq = sc.student_course_seq WHERE (IF(#{courseNumber}, 0, '기수') = '기수' OR c.course_number = #{courseNumber}) AND s.is_active = true AND c.academy_location = #{academyLocation} AND s.name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND s.is_active = true AND c.is_active = true AND (#{settlementDate} IS NULL OR #{settlementDate} = '' OR settlement_date = #{settlementDate}) AND settlement_date != '' and ssd.is_active = true
